title: Still Missing free poro party icon.
body: I received the riot kayle skin but not the free icon, about a week ago I submitted this same problem  and someone told me to wait until the 23rd to see if I would get it. It is now the 25th and I still haven't received the icon. Thank you for your fast responses and help on this matter.

replies.body:
I took a look at your account and it seems you should have received the Icon on the 26th. 

Let me know if you're still having problems with this.

Greetings!

Riot had to extend the time until September 30th due to some problems. You're still going to get your icon, but it's going to take a little longer than expected. 

If you don't have the icon after September 30th you can file a ticket.

- Okuma
